paper_title.ja: 金属積層造形における表面粗さに及ぼすレーザー光照射条件の影響
paper_title.en: Effect of the laser irradiation condition on surface roughness of metallic powder bed fusion

description.en: In metal AM technology, there are many reports on the effects of manufacturing conditions on the porosity, mechanical properties, and dimensional accuracy of products. However, there are few reports on the surface roughness of metal AM products. This study investigated the effect of laser irradiation conditions on the surface roughness of metal AM products in laser beam-powder bed fusion (LB-PBF). Specimens with different laser diameters, scanning velocity, hatching space, scanning path offsets, and scanning path strategies were prepared and measured the external dimensions and surface roughness. As a result of the experiment, it was found that the surface roughness of the product made by LB-PBF was affected by the laser spot diameter, scanning velocity, scanning path, and the placement of the product on the baseplate.
